mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (id, adm_id, title, content, img, hit, rdate) VALUES (notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{admId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{img}, 0, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET adm_id=#{admId}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, img=#{img}, hit=#{hit}, rdate=SYSDATE WHERE id=#{id}
